description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Torbjon Infogram – Add charts, maps and infographics allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Infogram – Add charts, maps and infographics: from n/a through 1.6.1.
